parameters.name: AlarmMetadata
parameters.description:
The alert configurations of the service.

>  This parameter takes effect only when you specify an alert policy for **PolicyNames**.

parameters.name: ApprovalType
parameters.description:
The approval type of the service usage application. Valid values:

*   Manual: The application is manually approved.
*   AutoPass: The application is automatically approved.

parameters.name: BuildParameters
parameters.description: The parameters for building the service

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

parameters.name: ComplianceMetadata
parameters.description: Compliance check metadata.

parameters.name: DeployMetadata
parameters.description: The storage configurations of the service. The format in which the deployment information of a service is stored varies based on the deployment type of the service. In this case, the deployment information is stored in the JSON string format.

parameters.name: DeployType
parameters.description:
The deployment type of the service. Valid values:

*   ros: The service is deployed by using Resource Orchestration Service (ROS).
*   terraform: The service is deployed by using Terraform.
*   ack: The service is deployed by using Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK).
*   spi: The service is deployed by calling a service provider interface (SPI).
*   operation: The service is deployed by using a hosted O\&M service.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to perform only a dry run for the request to check information. Valid values:

*   true: performs a dry run for the request, but does not create a service.
*   false: performs a dry run for the request, and create a service if the request passes the dry run.

parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: The duration for which hosted O\&M is implemented. Unit: seconds.

parameters.name: IsSupportOperated
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the hosted O\&M feature for the service. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

>  This parameter is required if you set **ServiceType** to **private**.

parameters.name: LicenseMetadata
parameters.description: The license metadata.

parameters.name: LogMetadata
parameters.description: The logging configurations.

parameters.name: OperationMetadata
parameters.description: The hosted O\&M configurations.

parameters.name: PolicyNames
parameters.description: The policy name. The name can be up to 128 characters in length. Separate multiple names with commas (,). Only hosted O\&M policies are supported.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID.

parameters.name: Resellable
parameters.description: Whether resell is supported.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: ServiceId
parameters.description: The service ID.

parameters.name: ServiceInfo
parameters.description: The service details.

parameters.name: ServiceType
parameters.description:
The service type. Valid values:

*   private: The service is a private service and is deployed within the account of a customer.
*   managed: The service is a fully managed service and is deployed within the account of a service provider.
*   operation: The service is a hosted O\&M service.
*   poc: The service is a trial service.

parameters.name: ShareType
parameters.description:
The permission type of the deployment URL. Valid values:

*   Public: All users can go to the URL to create a service instance or a trial service instance.
*   Restricted: Only users in the whitelist can go to the URL to create a service instance or a trial service instance.
*   OnlyFormalRestricted: Only users in the whitelist can go to the URL to create a service instance.
*   OnlyTrailRestricted: Only users in the whitelist can go to the URL to create a trial service instance.
*   Hidden: Users not in the whitelist cannot see the service details page when they go to the URL and cannot request deployment permissions.

parameters.name: SourceServiceId
parameters.description: The source service ID for resell。

parameters.name: SourceServiceVersion
parameters.description: The source service version for resell。

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The custom tags.

parameters.name: TenantType
parameters.description:
The type of the tenant. Valid values:

*   SingleTenant
*   MultiTenant

parameters.name: TrialDuration
parameters.description: The trial duration. Unit: day. The maximum trial duration cannot exceed 30 days.

parameters.name: UpgradeMetadata
parameters.description: The metadata about the upgrade.

parameters.name: VersionName
parameters.description: The version name.
